ModMetaData.name: Apini Playable Race
ModMetaData.author: Jack7D1
ModMetaData.description: Report bugs over on the github page! Want headgear from a certain mod? Drop the def name in the workshop comments! Currently incombaptible with VE-Vikings, a patch will be made once Vikings is stable. Remember to check the changelog on the workshop page for info about updates! Some info is very important! Want to contribute or want to know about upcomining changes and updates? Check out our github every now and then! Latest Changelog: Fixes crash with multiplayer mod and royalty Makes honey sellable again
